<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Archaeologist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6246) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=572" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 184 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Archaeologist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=237)

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47); Trained in [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=50)

</column>

---

You are a student of peoples and their histories, and are in constant pursuit of knowledge and artifacts from the past. You become an expert in [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47) and [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=50), and you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=2367) about ancient history, peoples, and cultures.

<title level="2">Archaeologist Dedication leads to...</title>
[Archaeologist's Luck](/Feats.aspx?ID=6250), [Magical Scholastics](/Feats.aspx?ID=6247), [Scholastic Identification](/Feats.aspx?ID=6249), [Settlement Scholastics](/Feats.aspx?ID=6248)
name: Archaeologist Dedication
prerequisite: Trained in Society; Trained in Thievery
